sentences.en: " I clothe the heavens with blackness And make sackcloth their covering. "
sentences.cn: 赛 50:3 我使诸天以黑暗为衣服、以麻布为遮盖.

sentences.en: As a boy I learned to feed and clothe Mike.
sentences.cn: 从孩提起,我就学会了给迈克尔喂饭穿衣.

sentences.en: Deck yourself with majesty and dignity , clothe yourself with and splendor.
sentences.cn: 你要以荣耀庄严为妆饰.以尊荣威严为衣服.

sentences.en: He had to work hard to feed and clothe the large family.
sentences.cn: 他必须努力工作才能使全家有饭吃,有衣穿.

sentences.en: He has to work hard to feed and clothe his family.
sentences.cn: 他必须努力工作以供给全家吃、穿.

sentences.en: I clothe the heavens with blackness, and I make sackcloth their covering.
sentences.cn: 3我使诸天以黑暗为衣服, 以麻布为遮盖.

sentences.en: If they refrain therefrom, clothe them and feed them suitably.
sentences.cn: 如果她们从此悔改,就适当地给她们衣食.

sentences.en: Learn in Italy; clothe yourself in Germany; banquet in Poland.
sentences.cn: 求学在意大利, 穿衣在德国, 美食在波兰.

sentences.en: She has to work hard to feed and clothe her family.
sentences.cn: 为了使家人有吃有穿,她不得不勤奋地工作.

sentences.en: She was on her own with two kids to feed and clothe.
sentences.cn: 她自己一个人要招呼两个孩子的衣食。

sentences.en: Take her downstairs, and make some of them clean and clothe her up.
sentences.cn: 把她带下楼去, 吩咐人给她洗干净,穿上衣服.

sentences.en: The King was clothed in a purple gown.
They are charitable. They feed the hungry and clothe the beggar.
sentences.cn: 他们是仁慈的, 他们给饥饿者饮食,给乞丐衣着.

sentences.en: They clothe their children in the latest fashions.
sentences.cn: 他们给他们的孩子穿最时髦的服装。

sentences.en: They could barely keep the family fed and clothed.
sentences.cn: 他们几乎无力为家人提供衣食。

sentences.en: They have to work hard to feed and clothe their family.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不为一家人的吃穿努力工作.

We clothe our thoughts in words.
